text.p: StarSight Telecast on Friday said it and Scientific-Atlanta Inc reached a licensing agreement that resolves outstanding disputes between the companies and establishes a new marketing relationship.
Under the deal, the companies will cross-license technologies. Also, Scientific-Atlanta will make an initial payment to StarSight for an undisclosed amount.

Scientific-Atlanta will offer the StarSight interactive program guide for television, as well as StarSight-licensed interactive program guides on Scientific-Atlanta's 8600X HCT advanced analog television set-top box.
Existing 8600X HCTs, or home communication terminals, can be upgraded to include StarSight's auto focus feature.
The agreement also provides for the StarSight interactive program guide and StarSight-licensed products to be available on Scientific-Atlanta's new Explorer 2000 digital set-top terminal.
